description: Pope Francis conducts holy mass marking the 100th anniversary of the Armenian massacre. Nathan Frandino reports.
title: Pope Francis calls Armenian massacre 'first genocide of 20th century'
title_page: Pope Francis calls Armenian massacre 'first genocide of 20th century' - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Pope Francis conducts holy mass marking the 100th anniversary of the Armenian massacre. Nathan Frandino reports.
